AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: echatere cheese maker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent much of the day making cheese out of echatere milk. Partly because [PAWN_pronoun] was reasonably good at it, partly because it helped keep a roof over [PAWN_possessive] head, but also partly because echatere cheese is supposedly an aphrodisiac. Though [PAWN_nameDef] could never confirm the truth about that last reason.
